text: Connie Sawyer, born Rosie Cohen, (November 27, 1912 - January 21, 2018), was an American actress of Jewish descent."Connie Sawyer: The world’s eldest working actress". Jewish Journal She was born in Pueblo, Colorado and grew up in Oakland, California. She retired in 2014. Sawyer was known for her roles in The Mary Tyler Moore Show, The Rockford Files, Hawaii Five-O, Dynasty, When Harry Met Sally..., Murder, She Wrote, Home Improvement, Seinfeld, Boy Meets World, Will & Grace, That '70s Show, 8 Simple Rules, ER, How I Met Your Mother and The Office. Sawyer died of a heart attack at her home in Woodland Hills, California on January 21, 2018 at the age of 105.Connie Sawyer Dies: Hollywood’s Oldest Working Actress Was 105 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1912 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Actors from Oakland, California Category:Actors from Colorado Category:American centenarians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish centenarians Category:People from Pueblo, Colorado
title: Connie Sawyer
